content: i love soap cozies and nothing beats a good soap bar with an amazing fragrance this is why i came up with this pattern as you can never have enough soap savers the pattern is **beginner friendly** and super easy to make and it creates a useful but pretty item for your home **difficulty ** easy/advanced beginner **size ** this pattern has one size enough to fit a standard sized soap * you can use 100% cotton dk yarn instead fingering weight yarn but note that the finished size will be bigger * i hope you ll love this pattern as much as i did creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina*
